_aChangeLog.text: Fixed skip on kz_ruins (new version is kz_ruins_fix) and added a stripper to replace the anticheat with a teleport if you dont like gravity

_sText:
Includes

bhop_speedhop
kz_bhop_cruma
kz_lava
kz_ruins

Extra
bhop_nightmare
kz_black_and_white
kz_kings_challenge


Descriptions

bhop_speedhop
Original map by ei-zmei
contains 1 course: bhop_speedhop
notes: not intended for legit scroll although possible to beat

kz_bhop_cruma
Original map by ei-zmei
contains 3 courses: kz_bhop_crumahop, kz_mad_mini #1 and kz_mad_mini #2

kz_lava
Original map by ei-zmei
contains 2 courses: kz_lava and kz_pillars_of_doom

kz_ruins
Original map by ei-zmei
contains 2 courses: kz_ruins and kz_dire_devil
notes: there's an antijump trigger throughout most of the ground level to prevent cheating/skipping, restarting your timer should reset gravity but pressing the start button will also reset gravity.

bhop_nightmare
Original map by FragGyver
contains 2 courses: bhop_nightmare and slide_minisliderace
notes: the sideways func_door platforms aren't supported by mpbhops

kz_black_and_white
Original map by FragGyver
contains 2 courses: kz_black_and_white and bhop_mind_and_matter

kz_kings_challenge
Original map by SoUlFaThEr
contains 2 courses: kz_kings_challenge #1 and kz_kings_challenge #2
